rows.label: qev075203_MSG0001
rows.name:
Whoa, that was close!
You nearly steamrolled me, my friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0002
rows.name:
You fight much like my master.
Quick and deadly, with no wasted movement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev075203_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod grimly.

rows.label: qev075203_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev075203_SEL0021
rows.name: Laugh and say that you're always wide open.

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0003
rows.name:
Such unwavering confidence is probably where those
moves all stem from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0004
rows.name:
Just open enough to lure your opponents in!
Much as a guerrilla force lures enemies into a trap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0005
rows.name:
You would have made an amazing Hellion had you
been born in the hidden village.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev075203_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask about the hidden village.

rows.label: qev075203_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev075203_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask about the Hundred Hellions.

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0006
rows.name:
It was the Hundred Hellion's home, where I grew up.
Tucked deep in the woods, far from prying eyes,
we spent our days training without pause.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0007
rows.name:
The Wrothians have fought legendary battles across the
galaxy, and always did the Hellions aid from the
shadows. They were the ultimate special forces unit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0008
rows.name:
The Wrothian way is to face the enemy head-on and
crush them through skill and power. But some fights
cannot be won by honorable struggle alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0009
rows.name:
At such times would they summon the Hundred Hellions.
We honed our blades and lurked in unseen places,
taking down problems with ambush and guile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0010
rows.name:
Each of us was a one-man army. One time,
the hundred of us fought back a force 30,000 strong![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0011
rows.name:
The Wrothians won much glory thanks to our shadowy
support. We were a proud band of warriors.
Ah, how I miss them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0012
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0013
rows.name:
Apologies. We are still in the middle of a match.
Being in this forest is bringing back memories.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075203_MSG0014
rows.name:
But I won't be so easy to find next time.
I'll prove to you that no one can out-guerrilla a Hellion![ST:wait ]
